rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0001
rows.name:
Now, the path to the Sanctus Chain
isn't an easy one.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0002
rows.name:
This city, Teos Aure, is positioned a 
long way above the Genbu Drifts.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0003
rows.name:
If you head out the palace and down
to the left, you'll see the ruins of a
place called Theospiti Temple.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0004
rows.name: Ruins? Even though inside city?

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0005
rows.name:
Yep. They really are ruined, too.
Practically rotted away!

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0006
rows.name:
Anyway, past the temple ruins is
something called the Teos Aure
Rear Gate. We head out through there.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0007
rows.name:
Then we have to follow the pillars
a long way down.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0008
rows.name:
Urgh... Sounds like a pain in the 
arse of a journey.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0009
rows.name:
But must be quick-quick!
Come on friends, to Genbu Drifts!

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0010
rows.name: Hey, I'm not done yet.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0011
rows.name:
Once we get to Genbu Drifts,
we have to head across it.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0012
rows.name:
That gets us to a place called the
Great Pillar Passage. The Sanctus Chain's at the end of that.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0013
rows.name:
Sound too long... Tora already
getting tired just listening.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0014
rows.name: Too soon for getting tired, Masterpon!

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0015
rows.name: This is no time for joking around, Tora.

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0016
rows.name:
We have to give this our all,
to protect Zeke's home!

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0017
rows.name: Of course!

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0018
rows.name: Right! Let's all do what we can!

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0019
rows.name: Thanks, guys. I owe you big time!

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0020
rows.name:
So, first we head out of here
to the left, got that?

rows.label: fev06_380_125_msg0021
rows.name: Tora remember just fine!
